item.title: LAMP Stack on AWS EC2
item.description: This post gives you a quick writeup on running a LAMP stack on AWS EC2 instance. LAMP is the acronym of Linux Apache Web Server MariaDB (Relational database) PHP (Serverside language) Steps to follow to install a LAMP Stack on AWS EC2 Create an EC2 instance with the following specifications Ubuntu 18.04 Server LTS OS Minimum 1 vCPU & 2 GB of RAM Minimum 8 GB of SSD In Security policy, Open SSH Port 22 to be accessed only from your local machine Open HTTP Port 80 & HTTPS Port 443 to be accessed from any IP (0.
